{"step_by_step_thinking": "Prader-Willi syndrome is caused by uniparental disomy of chromosome 15, as mentioned in Document [2] and Document [16]. Angelman syndrome is also caused by uniparental disomy of chromosome 15, as mentioned in Document [2] and Document [16]. Russell-Silver syndrome is caused by maternal uniparental disomy of chromosome 7, as mentioned in Document [22]. However, Bloom syndrome is not mentioned in any of the documents as being caused by uniparental disomy.", "answer_choice": "D. Bloom syndrome"}
